text: One Life is a British historical drama based on the true story of Nicholas Winton, portrayed by Sir Anthony Hopkins and Stephen Campbell Moorer. The plot revolves around the rescue of 669 children, mostly Jewish refugees, during World War II. Directed by James Hawes, the film features an all-star cast including Helena Bonham Carter,Adrian Leslie,Romola Garai,Lena Olin,Jonathan Pryce,Johnny Flynn,Alex Sharp,Marthe Keller,Samantha Spiro,Quincy Hereth,Tom Grenister,and Sam Finzi. The screenplay is adapted from a BBC television program featuring reunions betweenWinton and the now adult survivors. See-Saw Films produced the film.The film has been well-received by critics and audiences alike.
